noguild: Este comando não pode ser utilizado em mensagens privadas.
botmention:
Hey {user}, use **{emote} SlashCommands** to set me up!
Use {command} for more informations.
error: An error occurred while executing this command.

embeds.title: Sorry but Subscription is required
embeds.limittitle: Sorry but the Subscriptions limit was reached
embeds.description: In order we can provide a stable bot and money doesn't grow on trees, we have to lock non essential features behind a Subscription.

user.guild: You cannot run this action since you're missing the {perms} permissions.
user.channel: You cannot run this action since you're missing the {perms} permissions in this channel.

user.text: You cannot perform this action since the highest role of that user is higher than yours.

role.text: You cannot perform this action since your highest role is lower than the role to manage.

me.guild: Não posso executar esta ação porque não tenho as permissões {perms}.
me.channel: Não posso executar esta ação porque não tenho as permissões {perms} neste canal.

user.text: Eu não posso executar essa ação, uma vez que o maior cargo desse usuário é maior que o meu.

role.text: I cannot perform this action since my highest role is higher than the role to manage.

ad.vote: Por favor, ajude-nos em {url}, demora apenas alguns segundos
